DOC.brief_summary: A 2 5 year comparative evaluation clinical outcome treatment degenerative spinal stenosis concomitant low back pain decompression without additional stabilization use coflex® Interlaminar Technology FDA Real Conditions Use Study .
DOC.detailed_description: The first objective trial evaluate 5-year clinical status patient implant coflex® device conjunction surgical decompression relative decompression alone . The composite primary endpoint objective three part : 1 ) At least 15 point improvement relative pretreatment baseline Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI , range 0-100 ) ; 2 ) No reoperations , revision , removal , supplemental fixation index level ( ) ; 3 ) No ≥2 injection series injection treat level , nerve block procedure perform treat spinal stenosis index level ( ) single injection within 12 month 5 year endpoint . The second objective study compare clinical status patient implant coflex® device conjunction surgical decompression relative surgical decompression alone two year post-operatively confirm clinical non-inferiority term Month 24 composite clinical success ( CCS ) define similarly investigational device exemption ( IDE ) study endpoint . Objective 3 : If non-inferiority show two-years , evaluate evidence support superiority two-years term Month 24 CCS use informative prior distribution coflex® group . Finally , fourth objective trial evaluate coflex® device performance 'real condition use ' study confirm coflex® device performance clinically inferior PAS population compare pivotal IDE trial population . The Month 24 composite clinical success ( CCS ) endpoint use IDE trial use analysis facilitate comparison .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Radiographic confirmation least moderate lumbar stenosis , narrow central spinal canal one two contiguous level L1L5 require surgical decompression . Moderate stenosis define > 25 % reduction anteroposterior dimension compare next adjacent normal level , nerve root crowd compare normal level , determine investigator computerize tomography ( CT ) Scan MRI . The patient may , require inclusion study : Facet hypertrophy subarticular recess stenosis affect level ( ) ; Foraminal stenosis affect level ( ) ; Up stable Grade I degenerative spondylolisthesis ( Meyerding classification ) equivalent retrolisthesis determine flexion/extension X ray : ( ) For single level disease , may stable Grade I spondylolisthesis equivalent retrolisthesis affect level determine flexion/extension file investigator . ( ii ) For two level disease , may stable Grade I spondylolisthesis equivalent retrolisthesis ONLY ONE two contiguous affect level determine flexion/extension film investigator . Patients stable Grade I spondylolisthesis two contiguous level exclude , patient Grade I stable spondylolisthesis adjacent level may include . ( ) Mild lumbar scoliosis ( Cobb angle 25º ) 2 . Radiographic confirmation angular translatory instability spine index adjacent level ( instability define White & Panjabi : Sagittal plane translation > 4.5mm 15 % sagittal plane rotation > 15° L1L2 , L2L3 , L3L4 ; > 20° L4L5 base stand flexion/extension Xrays ) 3 . Visual Analog Scale back pain score least 50 mm 100 mm scale . 4 . Neurogenic claudication define leg/buttocks groin pain relieved flexion sit chair . 5 . Patient undergone least one epidural injection prior time point , AND least 6 month prior conservative care without adequate sustain symptom relief . 6 . Age 40 80 year . 7 . Oswestry Low Back Pain Disability Questionnaire score least 20/50 ( 40 % ) . 8 . Appropriate candidate treatment use posterior surgical approach . 9 . Psychosocially , mentally , physically able fully comply protocol , include adhere schedule visit , treatment plan , complete form , study procedure . 10 . More two contiguous vertebral level require surgical decompression . 2 . Severe facet hypertrophy require extensive bone removal would cause instability . 7 . Isthmic spondylolisthesis spondylolysis ( pars fracture ) . 8 . If DEXA required* , exclusion define DEXA bone density measure T score ≤ 1.0 ( The World Health Organization definition osteopenia ) . 11 . Back leg pain unknown etiology . 12 . Axial back pain , leg , buttock , groin pain . 13 . Morbid obesity define body mass index > 40 . 14 . Pregnant interested become pregnant next three year . 15 .
